hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Weatherford ISD is committed to the health, safety and academic learning of your child. Weatherford ISD will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.p: To view the different Weatherford ISD resources available to you during this extended closure, click on the specific title below that best fits your needs.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Please check back often as we will continue to update

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: For questions, click here to get support.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Playfair Display; font-size: 26px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Weatherford ISD students will receive pass/fail grades for the remainder of the year due to Coronavirus closure.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 9.599999999999998px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Teachers are monitoring student progress and will assign passing or failing grades for the 5

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 9.599999999999998px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: reporting period which ends on April 30, 2020.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 9.599999999999998px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: reporting period will be posted in Skyward on May 4, 2020.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 9.599999999999998px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Teachers will monitor student progress and will assign passing or failing grades for the 6

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 9.599999999999998px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: reporting period for the end of the school year.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Secondary students will not take final semester exams.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Dual Credit students will receive a grade from Weatherford College and a pass/fail from Weatherford High School.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: High School counselors will contact parent/students who had a failing grade the first semester to develop an individual plan to regain credit.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: *Teachers will work with students who have failing grades to provide makeup work, alternate assignments or other activities to bring their grades up.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Promotion for elementary and middle school students will be based on grades from the first four six week periods.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Valedictorian, salutatorian and local honors for seniors graduating in 2020 will be based on class ranks and GPAs from the first semester.
